meanings.definition: The quality of being skilled in a particular craft or trade.
meanings.sent1: Her craftsmanship in woodworking was evident in the beautifully carved furniture.
meanings.sent2: The gallery showcased various craftsmanships, from pottery to metalwork.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lack of craftsmanship in cooking, he always tried his best to make delicious meals.
meanings.sent4: The craftsmanship of the tailor was so precise that the dress seemed to be sewn by magic.
meanings.sent5: The craftsmanship of the artist transformed a simple canvas into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The work or products produced by a skilled craftsman.
meanings.sent1: The shop displayed exquisite craftsmanships of jewelry made by local artisans.
meanings.sent2: Each piece of furniture bore the mark of exceptional craftsmanships.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the vase, destroying the delicate craftsmanship of the glassblower.
meanings.sent4: The craftsmanship of the clockmaker was so precise that the clock never lost a second.
meanings.sent5: The craftsmanship of the carpenter turned a simple block of wood into a work of art.
